name: Miniature Dev - DEMO - Game Jam
description:
Welcome to the AIE Game Creating Studio! This is where you run around in a 2.5D environment, collecting and choosing assets to further develop your ideas in 3 disciplines; Designing, Art, and Programming.

All 3 levels are designed for the player to find and make decisions on how to design, produce, and make work a jetpack, and to help them understand what each discipline learns and creates at AIE.

IDEAS
If we had more time, here are some ideas we would like to further develop;
✦ Art Level - character customization
✦ Design Level - customization of map, including platforms to reach objectives
✦ Programming - more in depth programming, detailed nodes, and other variables
✦ Ability to run/travel between each level of disciplines 
✦ Art Level - more variety in end goals (colour, concepts, etc.)
✦ Clearer level design, and clearer objectives
✦ Enemies which player can combat while completing objectives
✦ About section for each level
✦  Sound design
✦  More polish 

CREDITS
✦Lachlan Hansford - Programming and Design
✦ Nate Wuttke - Artist
✦ Sophie Martin - Artist

48hr Game Jam At AIE from 12th of December to the 14th of December.
